price: 28. Ils diront : « Vous veniez à nous par la force (pour nous obliger à mécroire). »
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَأۡتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū innakum kuntum tatūnanā ʿani al-yamīni
